segments.text: So will you back me up if things get ugly with Elvin ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I will if you tell me how you're so sure that we're going to come out on top .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We just will.Trust me on that .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: After what you did , I don't know how hard Elvin's going to work to meet your deadline .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: He'll do it . He's too proud not to .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You've got everyone figured out , don't you ?
segments.speaker: S2
